52. .................Kg5 ..................... a white flag from my opponent!  Yes, I think it is just a case of take your pick from black.  Look at those passers!  White has only a bare king.  So, my opponent finally waved the white flag.  What a relief.  Notice how I sacrificed 5 material points to achieve this.  Joanne
